body: Sadly ive slowly accepted that ntr is part of majority of doujins, ive trained to get used to it but this one hurts
wtf going on?? This makes no sense!!

Yall mfs complaining about dog shit and lazy ending and pointless NTR and all that shit like what? Did you really think life will always play out for the better? Yo ass should be celebrating that that NTR tag was half assed and the pedo teacher got karma coming for him, unlike many of the actual dogshit lolicon doujinshi's out there. Of all the doujinshi's I've read, this one strikes the closest to reality, especially with the sad but inevitable separation of once closest of friends. 10/10.
What the fuck is this shit? Completely ruined the first two volumes.
Kinda sad ending but at least sex under pouring rain seems erotic enough
I was shipping Yoshida with Dobashi. Well whatever. Good story and drawing
Things like this pretty much happen irl. Good sex and good NTR
Wow, what a disappointing ending.  Must have gotten axed after the author threw in the garbage teacher/blackmail/NTR vibes.
I LIKE HOW THEY MANAGE TO MAKE A LAZY ENDING DESPITE THE GODTIER STORY
It just ends and that's the problem tbh. Three pages of dialogue and that's it. Still a good fap tho so there's that
I just realized that this was part 3 I was vary confused about God's and pilgrimages and a child dying??? the fuck is going on?
This is definitely missing a couple of tags (blackmail and rape).
The ending is too flat bruh, They manage to make a good story and proceed to trainwreck it with sa Shit Ending which is a 3 pages dialogue really putting sum work
LOL a bunch of kids are more rationally for reporting the teacher than your average FMC NTR xD, but that final for a doujin? Nop 5/10
Loved the seggs but not the story...
Not bad, but it's just so lonely.

I was reading this since last year but I only got to know the ending... Today. Anyways, it was pretty bittersweet. Life just kinda goes like that, yeah. Whether you spent your youth in some kind of orgy group or not, things will eventually change. And maybe this was for the best. At least they'll all be experienced when they all grow up. Good ending.
Good ending, very satisfying. Fuck all of you normies that think this ended badly
I feel so unsatisfied with the ending bruh
Ending fell FLAT.
The ending is somewhat too close to RL so it feels mehhh. But its ok ending if it were to happend irl i guess.
Hmm the ending is suck. Would've love if he keep pounding the girl for the end
What does my profile picture look like it's broken for me and I can't see it help ;(

All that build up, all ending with blackmail/rape  and a "fleeting adolescence" type of growing apart..

Story not only blueballed us on a spicy harem ending, but it also threw a curve ball at the end.

Would fit fine for a pornwha if I think about it.
What a bitter not so sweet ending. Anyways I felt like I've read this before.
sadge
Booo Sad end
